statements.statement: SELECT KPD.DISP_ORDER NO, TRIM(KPD.PARTS_NUMBER) PARTS_NUMBER, TRIM(KPD.MATERIAL_NAME) MATERIAL_NAME, KPD.END_TIME END_TIME, TO_CHAR(KPICR.DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE, TRIM(KPD.ZAIKAN_PRIMARY_LOCATION) ZAIKAN_PRIMARY_LOCATION, TRIM(KPD.ZAIKAN_SECONDARY_LOCATION) || '-' || TRIM(KPD.ZAIKAN_TERTIARY_LOCATION) ZAIKAN_SEC_TER_LOCATION, TRIM(KPD.SNP) SNP, TRIM(KPD.SCAN_COMP_PICKING_BOX_COUNT) || '/' || TRIM(KPD.PICKING_BOX_COUNT) PICKING_BOX_COUNT, CASE WHEN KPD.STATUS = 9 THEN '完了' ELSE '未完了' END PICKING_STATUS, KPD.KANBAN_COMPARE_COMP_TIME KANBAN_COMPARE_COMP_TIME FROM TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_DETAIL KPD LEFT JOIN TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_IDENTIFICATION_CARD_RECORD KPICR ON KPD.PICKING_LIST_NO = KPICR.PICKING_LIST_NO AND KPD.DISP_ORDER = KPICR.DISP_ORDER WHERE KPD.PICKING_LIST_NO = #pickingNo# ORDER BY KPD.DISP_ORDER, KPICR.DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE ASC
